## R Markdown

```{ndividual Words and their parts of speech}
#install.packages("SnowballC")
#install.packages("dplyr")
library(SnowballC)
library(dplyr)

parole_sub2 <- parole_sub %>%
  select(text) %>%
  unnest_tokens(output = word, input = text) %>%
  anti_join(stop_words) %>%
  mutate(word = tolower(word)) 


parts_of_speech_ad <- parts_of_speech %>%
  filter(pos %in% c("Adjective", "Adverb"))

parole_sub2 <- parole_sub2 %>%
  left_join(parts_of_speech_ad, by = "word")
  
#endgram an bygram

```

```{Grouping by Adj and Adverb}
parole_sub3 <- parole_sub2 %>%
  group_by(word, pos) %>%
  summarise(count = n())%>%
  arrange(desc(count)) %>%
  na.omit()
```

```{Attaching Sentiments to Words}
parole_sentiments <- get_sentiments()
parole_sub4 <- parole_sub3 %>%
  left_join(parole_sentiments, by = "word")
# anti_join(parole_sentiments) 

parole_sub4[is.na(parole_sub4)] <- "neutral"
```
